value:
We are all human; disagreements
are inevitable. But understanding
becomes possible with effort.

We cannot just stand by and watch as
the flames of war spread across the
world. We must all do what we can.

I made this outfit to resemble Alm's
armor. That way, we need never be
separated.

The power of faith can change the
future. I have learned this well on
my ongoing journey to save Valentia.

To be considered a true warrior
priestess, one must master
sword and spell both.

I am Celica, princess of Zofia. I offer
a token of enduring amity from
$Nf.

With this power, I shall protect the
land of the goddess Mila and all
those I cherish!
I feel my thoughts become power...
I cannot give up on the future!

I must give thanks to the Earth Mother
for her blessings.

I am Celica, princess of Zofia. I will
lend my aid as a warrior priestess
under Mila's divine protection.

I learned many lessons as I journeyed
with my companions.$k$pWhat was particularly etched into my
mind was the need for the strength to
protect others, wielded with love.$k$pIdeals alone won't build the
future; power alone won't win
people's hearts.$k$pTo move forward, we need both
fortitude and sympathy.$k$pI live with the wills of my cherished
friends, who strove to shape the
future, and my prayers for peace.$k$pI must stay strong and protect all that
is dear to me—with Alm by my
side forever!
May this land prosper.
I will protect everyone.
With Mila's strength...
Alm is with me!
Not yet...
I feel invigorated—as if I've been reborn.
Oh! Mischievous as ever, I see.
I feel so warm, it's as though the goddess Mila herself dwells within me.
Alm and I can get through anything, so long as we're together.
The strength to protect others, wielded with love—that is how you save the world.
I hope always for peace and prosperity for Valentia.
You have earned my sincere devotion. I will never hesitate to fight for you.
Lead the way.
Where to?
I will not waver.
